description: large water kettle with hinged cover; two bone or ivory rings on handle; shoulder decorated with scrolling flowers; raised stand with warming burner at bottom center
markings: under warmer, stamped: [ORTEGA], [925], [(wreath and bird?)], [MEXICO], [2738]; under warmer handle: illegible stamp; under stand: [ORTEGA], [MEXICO], [(wreath and bird?) 8], [926], [28887]; on bottom of kettle, stamped: [(wreath and bird?) 8], [9 (illegible)], [ORTEGA], [MEXICO], [28887]
object_name: Water kettle and stand, from a six-piece tea and coffee service
title: Water kettle and stand, from a six-piece tea and coffee service
